entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 01:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: NNE 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
